string-array.name: club_descriptions
string-array.item: Real Madrid is the biggest club in the world.
Manchester United is known as the Red Devils.
Barcelona is famous for its tiki-taka playing style.
Chelsea is based in London and known as the Blues.
Liverpool is known for its passionate fans and Anfield.
Dortmund is famous for its yellow wall of fans.
PSG is a powerhouse in French football.
AC Milan has a rich history in Serie A and the Champions League.
Juventus is known for its iconic black-and-white stripes.
